About Me

Wanna know me? Here you go...

BIO

I am a 20 years old Bangladeshi student, currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Industrial and Production Engineering at BUET. I am a self taught web designer and love to build cool webpages. I grew up in a small village in Siarajganj. I have my parents and a little brother in my family and i love them the most in the world.

EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND

RUMC,MABS,TRVKG

I took my primary education in my own village at our own school named The Riverview Kindergarten. I studied in two different high school. Completed my junior school certificate exam at MABS. I completed my secondary and higher secondary exam from Rajuk Uttara Model College.
